item.description:
Greetings, all! By popular demand and a great conversation with Jim at Hope & Olive, I am excited to announce that our next meeting will be on Sunday, November 15th at 5:30pm at Hope & Olive in Greenfield. Guess what? it's really easy to find, it's on the corner of...Hope AND Olive streets!

For the last year, since I moved to the area, I have heard only great things about this little gem of a spot, tucked away off the main drag in Greenfield. Their stated mission: We serve homegrown, farm-inspired food & drink, presented simply, using the best ingredients from our neighborhood is in perfect alignment with our criteria, so let's go chow down and have fun!

If you have any questions or special requests, please let me know as soon as possible.

For those of you who have not registered for an event before, please let me remind you that there is a $5.00 per person registration fee, which covers our admin costs and also provides us with a delicious "tasting plate" at the restaurant! Once we are there, we are each responsible for our $25.00 per person 3 course meal, (not including tax + gratuity) and any beverages we may have.

I know I speak for Chris and myself when I say I am so much looking forward to this upcoming event, please RSVP whether or not you plan to attend so we can get an accurate count for the venue.

Take care and see you in a couple of weeks!

warmly,

Jessica
item.name: November EatUp! at Hope & Olive in Greenfield!
